## Questions for Discussion 

Did you try the activity listed? If not, give it a try. After that, answer the following question.

What are your thoughts on moral/ethical decisions with respect to autonomous vehicles, especially in the case of who to save when getting into an accident. Do you think your opinion on this matter would be universal? It's unlikely. In that case, who gets to decide what decision an autonomous vehicle should make?
